course_title: Topics in Afr American Studies: African AmericanWomen&Politics
seats: Seats: Maximum Enrollment: 25 / Seats Avail: 20Waitlist Total: 0
class_notes: Students will be introduced to  the study of Black women and U.S. politics including the central questions, concepts, and debates in the field.
course_description: This course explores one of a wide range of topics pertaining to the African American experience in the fields of human and civil rights, social and literary texts, and the social sciences.
sections: Class Nbr: 2498, Section #: 2, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: TTh 11:30a-12:45p, Instructor: P. Dowe, Status: Open
